tool_description: Recommends appropriate wood species based on project requirements, budget, and intended use conditions.

budget_level.description: Budget constraint: low, medium, or high

preferred_grain.description: Desired grain pattern: tight, medium, or pronounced

color_preference.description: Preferred wood color: light, medium, or dark

error_messages: Invalid environment: Use indoor or outdoor
Invalid budget level: Use low, medium, or high
Invalid grain preference: Use tight, medium, or pronounced
Invalid color preference: Use light, medium, or dark
Incompatible requirements: Some combinations may not have suitable wood options
usage: Specify project type, environment, and budget level. Optionally set grain and color preferences. The tool provides ranked wood species recommendations with explanations.

cost_per_board_foot.description: Estimated cost per board foot for primary recommendation

workability_notes.description: Important notes about working with the recommended wood
